kademlia

类 FindOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • kademlia.FindOperation

  • public class FindOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a find operation and offer the methods needed to maintain and update the closest set.
    It also maintains the number of parallel requsts that can has a maximum of ALPHA.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      int available_requests
      number of available find request message to send (it must be always less than ALPHA)
      java.lang.Object body
      Body of the original find message
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.math.BigInteger,java.lang.Boolean> closestSet
      This map contains the K closest nodes and corresponding boolean value that indicates if the nodes has been already queried or not
      java.math.BigInteger destNode
      Id of the node to find
      protected int nrHops
      Number of hops the message did
      long operationId
      represent univocally the find operation
      protected long timestamp
      Start timestamp of the search operation

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FindOperation(java.math.BigInteger destNode, long timestamp)
      defaul constructor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void elaborateResponse(java.math.BigInteger[] neighbours)
      update closestSet with the new information received
      java.math.BigInteger getNeighbour()
      get the first neighbour in closest set wich has not been already queried
